text: $(#bd951a)Special: $()$(#ff0000)Nocturnal. Steals one non-obstacle Metal/Electronic object from a Zombie, and up to two 2 blocks near it, then throws them, causing damage based on the object's health (64 dmg w/o health) + half of that dmg as 1.5 block splash.
$(br)$(#bd951a)I would insert a Marvel reference here, if I knew anything about it.

pages.title: ‚è≥ Contain Family
pages.text: $(#25228d)Magneto-shrooms remove metal objects from zombies, then launches them.
